item.title: Adaptive Depth Networks with Skippable Sub-Paths
item.description: Adaptive Depth Networks with Skippable Sub-Paths: Train once, deploy efficiently! This paper proposes a novel training method to create adaptive-depth networks, enabling on-demand model depth selectio…
